global.policiesText1: Free delicery for all orders over $140
global.newsletterText: and reveive $20 coupon for first shopping
global.storeInfo: We have specialized in delivering the best e-Commerce solutions in both B2B/ B2C markets with the world-class platforms.

successMesg.contactText: We've received your message and appreciate you reaching out.

page.returnEnterEmail: Enter your info below to begin your Return Request:
page.returnSuccessHeading: Thanks for Submitting your Returns Form
page.returnSuccessText: Our Customer Happiness Team will review your Returns Request and be in contact with you within the next 1-2 Business Day.
page.notFoundText: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. Try checking the URL or heading back to the home page.
page.returnNote: We currently do not offer Exchanges. If you would like to exchange, please submit a Return Request and we will process a refund for you. You can then place a new order.
page.returnText: To be eligible for a full refund, the items must be unused, unworn, undamaged,unmarked and in it's original box or packaging.
page.orderTrakingText: To track your order please enter your Order ID and Billing email in the box below and press the Track button.
